meanings.definition: Relating to or composed of anorthosite.
meanings.sent1: The anorthositic rock sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was covered in anorthositic rocks.
meanings.sent3: The anorthositic stone seemed to wink at me as I passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone like anorthositic gems in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The anorthositic surface glistened like a field of diamonds.

meanings.definition: Resembling anorthosite in composition or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The sky had an anorthositic hue as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: The building's walls were painted in an anorthositic color.
meanings.sent3: The anorthositic clouds looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an anorthositic quality that was soothing to hear.
meanings.sent5: The landscape was bathed in an anorthositic glow as evening fell.
